resources.string: This application is for entertainment purposes only. It is NOT intended for actual dive planning. \ All calculations should be verified by other sources.

"Calculates the best oxygen content for a nitrox mixture for a given depth. " "After setting the parameters, press the CALC button to display the best oxygen " "percent next to the green O2 label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"PO2 is the maximum desired pressure of oxygen. Avalaible options are 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6 (default is 1.4).

"
"FEET is the maximun depth.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"

"Calculates the deepest depth in feet for a nitrox mixture. After setting the " "parameters, press the CALC button to display the maximum operating depth next to the green " "MOD label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"PO2 is the maximum desired pressure of oxygen. Avalaible options are 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6 (default is 1.4).

"
"O2% is the oxygen content of the nitrox gas. Avalaible options are 10 through 100.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"

"Calculates the pressure of oxygen for a nitrox mixture at a given depth. " "After setting the parameters, press the CALC button to display the pressure of oxygen " "next to the green PO2 label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"O2% is the oxygen content of the nitrox gas. Avalaible options are 10 through 100.

"
"FEET is the maximun depth.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"

"Calculates the equivalent air depth of a nitrox mixture. " "After setting the parameters, press the CALC button to display the equivalent air depth " "next to the green EAD label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"O2% is the oxygen content of the nitrox gas. Avalaible options are 10 through 100.

"
"FEET is the maximun depth.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"

"Calculates new nitrox mixture. "
"from old mix and psi for top off with mix and psi.



"

"The following calculations are available by pressing their respective buttons.

"
BEST MIX OXYGEN(O2):
"Calculates the best oxygen content for a nitrox mixture for a given depth. " "After setting the parameters, press the CALC button to display the best oxygen " "percent next to the green O2 label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"PO2 is the maximum desired pressure of oxygen. Avalaible options are 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6 (default is 1.4).

"
"FEET is the maximun depth.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"
MAX OPERATING DEPTH(MOD):
"Calculates the deepest depth in feet for a nitrox mixture. After setting the " "parameters, press the CALC button to display the maximum operating depth next to the green " "MOD label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"PO2 is the maximum desired pressure of oxygen. Avalaible options are 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6 (default is 1.4).

"
"O2% is the oxygen content of the nitrox gas. Avalaible options are 10 through 100.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"
PRESSURE OF OXYGEN(PO2):
"Calculates the pressure of oxygen for a nitrox mixture at a given depth. " "After setting the parameters, press the CALC button to display the pressure of oxygen " "next to the green PO2 label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"O2% is the oxygen content of the nitrox gas. Avalaible options are 10 through 100.

"
"FEET is the maximun depth.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"
EQUIVALENT AIR DEPTH(EAD):
"Calculates the equivalent air depth of a nitrox mixture. " "After setting the parameters, press the CALC button to display the equivalent air depth " "next to the green EAD label.

"
"Parameters:

"
"O2% is the oxygen content of the nitrox gas. Avalaible options are 10 through 100.

"
"FEET is the maximun depth.

"
"SALT WATER / FRESH WATER is the type of water.



"
